sentences.en: He opened up China's Turkic Uighur and research work, at abroad by the attention and praise.
sentences.cn: 他开创了中国对回鹘文和突厥文的研究工作, 在国内外受到重视和好评.

sentences.en: One is the reconstruction based on Altaic languages, the other is based on turkic languages.
sentences.cn: 一种是以阿尔泰语系语言为基础的构拟, 一种是以突厥语族语言为基础的构拟.

sentences.en: Specific dragons are often given Turkic names, symbolizing the long - standing conflict between the Slavs and Turks.
sentences.cn: 确切的龙经常被命名以具有土耳其风格的名字, 这是斯拉夫与土耳其 长期 冲突的表现.

sentences.en: The official language is Uzbek, Turkic languages belong to the Altai southeast Group ( Geluolu ) language support.
sentences.cn: 官方语言为乌兹别克语, 属于阿尔泰语系突厥语组东南 ( 葛逻禄 ) 语支.

sentences.en: The use of Uzbek language belongs to Altaic Turkic language branch, West Huns.
sentences.cn: 使用乌孜别克语,属阿尔泰语系突厥语族西匈奴语支.

sentences.en: The vowels of the Kirghiz language are peculiar in the Turkic languages.
sentences.cn: 元音在突厥语族诸语言中非常重要,而柯尔克孜语的元音又具有显著的特征.

trans.tran_cn: 土耳其语，土耳其语系者
trans.tran_en: a branch or subfamily of the Altaic family of languages, including Turkish, Turkmen, Kirghiz, Tatar, etc, members of which are found from Turkey to NE China, esp in central Asia
